item.title: CVE-2022-48453|2024-09-30T18:52:35.038Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- sc7731e
item.description: In camera driver, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local denial of service with System execution privileges needed
